Name: Broken Sky
About the game: Broken Sky is a fast paced dogfighting shooter featuring unlockable planes, weapons and special abilities. Arcade action from the start. No boring, long winded missions - just fly, shoot and kill as many aliens as you can. Use resource points to equip your plane however you want and go into battle against the alien hordes. Featuring: Super fast air combat with responsive controls and explosive weapons. 6 Different plane types. 6 primary weapons, 6 secondary weapons and 4 specials. All weapons are interchangeable depending on Plane Resource Points. Wander around the Pilots bunker and log-in to the terminals. 23 different achievements based on Survival time, Kills and Missions flown. 30+ random bonus challenges to complete. 14+ different enemy types. Loads of Steam Achievements to unlock. Steam Leaderboards - Can you make it to the top?! plus loads of crashes, abductions and massive explosions!
